name: 601MAX
longDescription:
Το iSmartTool 601MAX ειναι ενα εργαλείο TMPS που διαθέτει πολλές λειτουργίες οπως διαγνωστικο εξαιρετικής κάλυψης (Ευρωπη και Ασία) και αναλυτής μπαταρίας. Ως TPMS, καλύπτει το 98% των οχημάτων που εξοπλίζονται με σύστημα πίεσης ελαστικών. Μπορεί να διαβάσει δεδομένα σχετικά με την πίεση και θερμοκρασία ελαστικών.

Διαθέτει και διαγνωστικό για έλεγχο της μπαταρίας του οχήματος. Το SmartSafe έχει αναπτυχθεί ειδικά για τα συνεργεία και βουλκανιζατέρ για τη διάγνωση βλαβών σε αισθητήρα ελαστικών.

features.text: Υποστήριξη testing πλήρους συστήματος και πλήρους λειτουργίες σε περισσότερες από 100 μάρκες αυτοκινήτων στην Ευρώπη, την Αμερική, την Ασία και την Κίνα
Έλεγχος υγείας μπαταριών μολύβδου-οξέος επιβατικών αυτοκινήτων
features.svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' class='icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-battery-automotive' width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24' stroke-width='1.5' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'><path stroke='none' d='M0 0h24v24H0z' fill='none'/><path d='M3 6m0 2a2 2 0 0 1 2 -2h14a2 2 0 0 1 2 2v10a2 2 0 0 1 -2 2h-14a2 2 0 0 1 -2 -2z' /><path d='M6 6v-2' /><path d='M19 4l0 2' /><path d='M6.5 13l3 0' /><path d='M14.5 13l3 0' /><path d='M16 11.5l0 3' /></svg>

features.text: Υποστήριξη ενεργοποίησης, αντιστοίχισης και εκμάθησης όλων των αισθητήρων πίεσης ελαστικών 315MHz/433MHz και ανάγνωηση δεδομένων πίεσης ελαστικών
features.svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' class='icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-wheel' width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24' stroke-width='1.5' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'><path stroke='none' d='M0 0h24v24H0z' fill='none'/><path d='M12 12m-9 0a9 9 0 1 0 18 0a9 9 0 1 0 -18 0' /><path d='M12 12m-3 0a3 3 0 1 0 6 0a3 3 0 1 0 -6 0' /><path d='M3 12h6' /><path d='M15 12h6' /><path d='M13.6 9.4l3.4 -4.8' /><path d='M10.4 14.6l-3.4 4.8' /><path d='M7 4.6l3.4 4.8' /><path d='M13.6 14.6l3.4 4.8' /></svg>

features.text: Υποστήριξη 26 κοινών λειτουργιών συντήρησης, υποστήριξη CAN FDDoIP και άλλων πρωτοκόλλων ανίχνευσης
features.svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' class='icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-source-code' width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24' stroke-width='1.5' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'><path stroke='none' d='M0 0h24v24H0z' fill='none'/><path d='M14.5 4h2.5a3 3 0 0 1 3 3v10a3 3 0 0 1 -3 3h-10a3 3 0 0 1 -3 -3v-5' /><path d='M6 5l-2 2l2 2' /><path d='M10 9l2 -2l-2 -2' /></svg>

features.text: Άμεση εκτύπωση αναφοράς μέσω του ενσωματωμένου εκτυπωτή ή δυνατότητα κοινοποίησης μέσω email
features.svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' class='icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-printer' width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24' stroke-width='1.5' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'><path stroke='none' d='M0 0h24v24H0z' fill='none'/><path d='M17 17h2a2 2 0 0 0 2 -2v-4a2 2 0 0 0 -2 -2h-14a2 2 0 0 0 -2 2v4a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h2' /><path d='M17 9v-4a2 2 0 0 0 -2 -2h-6a2 2 0 0 0 -2 2v4' /><path d='M7 13m0 2a2 2 0 0 1 2 -2h6a2 2 0 0 1 2 2v4a2 2 0 0 1 -2 2h-6a2 2 0 0 1 -2 -2z' /></svg>

functionsText: Το ST06 δεν είναι μόνο ένας ελεγκτής αισθητήρα πίεσης ελαστικών αλλά και ένα πολυλειτουργικό εργαλείο που ενσωματώνει τη δοκιμή μπαταρίας και τη διάγνωση αυτοκινήτου. Όσον αφορά τα διαγνωστικά αυτοκινήτων, παρέχει μια πιο ολοκληρωμένη λύση για συνεργεία.

functionItems.title: Battery Detection
functionItems.description: Supports two methods of in-vehicle detection and out-of-vehicle detection, supports battery health test, start-up test, charging test, battery barcode scanning, and battery matching

functionItems.title: Tire Pressure Detection
functionItems.description: Support 315MHz/433MHz tire pressure sensor activation and learning, support reading tire pressure, tire temperature, battery status and other information, and can read, copy, and write sensor ID values

functionItems.title: Vehicle Detection
functionItems.description: Support for code reading, code clearing, data stream reading, action testing, special functions and other full-system and full-function detections

functionItems.title: Maintenance Function
functionItems.description: Support 26 common maintenance functions, such as maintenance light reset, throttle matching, brake pad replacement, steering angle reset, anti-theft matching, ABS bleeding injector coding, DPF regeneration, sunroof initialization, Gearbox matching, etc

functionItems.title: Test Report
functionItems.description: Support the display of battery tests, tire pressure monitoring, fault detection, data flow and other reports

functionItems.title: Software Upgrade
functionItems.description: Support online upgrades, including model software, firmware software, and APP software

functionItems.title: Module Expansion
functionItems.description: Support the expansion of videoscope functions

functionItems.title: Report Printing
functionItems.description: Support printing reports through the built-in thermal printer

videos.name: iSmartTool601Max for Battery Reset Function Explanation

files.name: SmartSafe ST10 Intelligent Automotive Detection Tool Product Catalog
SmartSafe ST10 Intelligent Automotive Detection Tool User's Manual

name: CAT-501S
shortDescription: Συσκευή αλλαγής λαδιών σασμάν αυτόματου κιβωτίου ATF
longDescription: Το Automatic Transmission Flush Machine είναι ένα απαραίτητο εργαλείο για τη συντήρηση και τη διατήρηση της καλής λειτουργίας των αυτόματων κιβωτίων ταχυτήτων. Το μηχάνημα ξεπλένει αποτελεσματικά το παλιά λάδια του κιβωτίου ταχυτήτων, αφαιρώντας επιβλαβείς ρύπους και υπολείμματα που μπορούν να εμποδίσουν τη σωστή λειτουργία να μπλοκάρουν ή να φθείρουν εξαρτήματα και μηχανισμούς. Αντικαθιστώντας το παλιό υγρό με φρέσκο υγρό υψηλής ποιότητας, βελτιώνουμε τη λίπανση, μειώνουμε την τριβή και παρατείνουμε τη διάρκεια ζωής του κιβωτίου ταχυτήτων. Με την προηγμένη τεχνολογία του, το Auto Transmission Flush Machine εξασφαλίζει σχολαστικό και αποτελεσματικό ξέπλυμα, παρέχοντας βέλτιστα αποτελέσματα. Η συσκευή ειναι είναι μια πολύτιμη επένδυση για το συνεργείο ειδικά τώρα που τα αυτόματα κιβώτια έχουν τέτοια εξέλιξη και διείσδυση στην αγορά.

features.text: Automatic identification of transmission inlet and outlet oil directions
features.svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' class='icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-id-badge-2' width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24' stroke-width='1.5' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'><path stroke='none' d='M0 0h24v24H0z' fill='none'/><path d='M7 12h3v4h-3z' /><path d='M10 6h-6a1 1 0 0 0 -1 1v12a1 1 0 0 0 1 1h16a1 1 0 0 0 1 -1v-12a1 1 0 0 0 -1 -1h-6' /><path d='M10 3m0 1a1 1 0 0 1 1 -1h2a1 1 0 0 1 1 1v3a1 1 0 0 1 -1 1h-2a1 1 0 0 1 -1 -1z' /><path d='M14 16h2' /><path d='M14 12h4' /></svg>

features.text: Equipped with a variety of specialized adapters suitable for vehicles from various countries
features.svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' class='icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-plug-connected' width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24' stroke-width='1.5' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'><path stroke='none' d='M0 0h24v24H0z' fill='none'/><path d='M7 12l5 5l-1.5 1.5a3.536 3.536 0 1 1 -5 -5l1.5 -1.5z' /><path d='M17 12l-5 -5l1.5 -1.5a3.536 3.536 0 1 1 5 5l-1.5 1.5z' /><path d='M3 21l2.5 -2.5' /><path d='M18.5 5.5l2.5 -2.5' /><path d='M10 11l-2 2' /><path d='M13 14l-2 2' /></svg>

features.text: Supports the addition of cleaning agents for performing circulation cleaning of the automatic transmission
Intelligent electronic control ensures automatic equal-volume replacement of new and used oil
features.svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' class='icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-droplet-search' width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24' stroke-width='1.5' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'><path stroke='none' d='M0 0h24v24H0z' fill='none'/><path d='M18.064 10.877l-4.89 -7.26c-.42 -.625 -1.287 -.803 -1.936 -.397a1.376 1.376 0 0 0 -.41 .397l-4.893 7.26c-1.695 2.838 -1.035 6.441 1.567 8.546a7.13 7.13 0 0 0 4.168 1.572' /><path d='M18 18m-3 0a3 3 0 1 0 6 0a3 3 0 1 0 -6 0' /><path d='M20.2 20.2l1.8 1.8' /></svg>

features.text: Provides an extensive vehicle model database, eliminating the need for manual oil quantity setting
features.svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' class='icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-database' width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24' stroke-width='1.5' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'><path stroke='none' d='M0 0h24v24H0z' fill='none'/><path d='M12 6m-8 0a8 3 0 1 0 16 0a8 3 0 1 0 -16 0' /><path d='M4 6v6a8 3 0 0 0 16 0v-6' /><path d='M4 12v6a8 3 0 0 0 16 0v-6' /></svg>

features.text: Features oil temperature display and oil filter replacement reminder function
features.svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' class='icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-temperature' width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24' stroke-width='1.5' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'><path stroke='none' d='M0 0h24v24H0z' fill='none'/><path d='M10 13.5a4 4 0 1 0 4 0v-8.5a2 2 0 0 0 -4 0v8.5' /><path d='M10 9l4 0' /></svg>

functionsText: ATF501 Automatic Transmission Flush Machine is a state-of-the-art device designed to optimize the performance and longevity of your vehicle's automatic transmission. This advanced machine ensures a thorough and precise flush, leaving your transmission cleaner and more efficient. With the Automatic Transmission Flush Machine, you can experience smoother shifts, improved driving experience, and increased reliability. Invest in this innovative machine to give your vehicle's transmission the care it deserves.

functionItems.title: Transmission Oil Level Adjustment
functionItems.description: Customizes oil level adjustments, refilling or draining the set amount of transmission oil

functionItems.title: Transmission Oil Replacement
functionItems.description: Automatically identifies transmission inlet and outlet ports, enabling equal-volume replacement of automatic transmission oil

functionItems.title: Transmission Oil Circulation Cleaning
functionItems.description: Allows the addition of cleaning agents for circulating cleaning of the automatic transmission

functionItems.title: New and Used Oil Drain
functionItems.description: Automatically drains automatic transmission oil from new and used oil barrels in the equipment

functionItems.title: Custom Vehicle Data
functionItems.description: Supports the custom addition of maintenance data for commonly used automatic transmission models

functionItems.title: Printing
functionItems.description: Supports printing of equipment execution results, with customizable repair shop information

videos.name: CAT-501S Auto Transmission Cleaner and Fluid Exchanger Practical Test Simulation

files.name: SmartSafe ATF501 Auto Transmission Cleaner and Fluid Exchanger Product Catalog
SmartSafe ATF501 Auto Transmission Cleaner and Fluid Exchanger User's Manual

name: ismartIMMO G3
shortDescription: Επαγγελματικός προγραμματιστής & σαρωτής Auto Key Immobilizer
longDescription:
Το iSmartIMMO G3 χρησιμοποιείται για την ανάγνωση και εγγραφή δεδομένων από και προς το τσιπ κλειδιών αυτοκινήτου.
Αυτό συμπεριλαμβάνει της ανάγνωση και εγγραφή σε EEPROM αλλά και ανάγνωση και εγγραφή στην MCU αυτοκινήτου, κατάλληλο για κλειδιά υπέρύθρων από Mercedes-Benz, δημιουργεί ειδικά κλειδιά. Διαβάζει INS κωδικούς απο κινητήρα BMW και γράφει /διαβάζει chip BMW CAS4+/FEM, κ.λπ.

features.text: Powerful function, integrated key matching/copy, car anti-theft chip read-write, car computer read-write and other functions
It can be used with a variety of SmartSafe detection tools, no binding, flexible use and wide adaptation range
features.svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' class='icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-tool' width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24' stroke-width='1.5' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'><path stroke='none' d='M0 0h24v24H0z' fill='none'/><path d='M7 10h3v-3l-3.5 -3.5a6 6 0 0 1 8 8l6 6a2 2 0 0 1 -3 3l-6 -6a6 6 0 0 1 -8 -8l3.5 3.5' /></svg>

features.text: It can be used with IMMO PCBOX to operate on the computer terminal
features.svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' class='icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-terminal-2' width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24' stroke-width='1.5' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'><path stroke='none' d='M0 0h24v24H0z' fill='none'/><path d='M8 9l3 3l-3 3' /><path d='M13 15l3 0' /><path d='M3 4m0 2a2 2 0 0 1 2 -2h14a2 2 0 0 1 2 2v12a2 2 0 0 1 -2 2h-14a2 2 0 0 1 -2 -2z' /></svg>

functionsText: The IMMO G3 Key Immobilizer Programmer provides a robust anti-theft solution by enabling the programming of vehicle key, engine, and gearbox, with its wide coverage of multiple parts reprogramming for various vehicles. This device is particularly suitable for professional repair shops and auto repair businesses as an excellent choice.

functionItems.title: Car Anti-theft
functionItems.description: Add Mercedes-Benz, BMW, Volkswagen Audi and other car series, Porsche anti-theft function and engine computer and gearbox cloning function of other car series

functionItems.title: Key Matching
functionItems.description: Add functions such as Mercedes-Benz infrared key, key imitation duplicator, key reading and writing, etc

files.name: SmartSafe IMMO G3 Immobilizer Programmer Product Catalog
SmartSafe IMMO G3 Immobilizer Programmer User's Manual

name: D01
longDescription:
Διαγνωστική συσκευή που καλύπτει παρα πολύ καλά ευρωπαικά και ασιατικά οχήματα
Μπορει να κωδικοποιησει κλειδια σε συνδιασμο με εξωτερικη συσκευή και ειναι θυγατρικη της LAUNCH
ADAS
TPMS
Κωδικοποιησεις και ππρογραμματισμοι εγκεφάλων
Μέγεθος οθόνης 10,1'
2.0GHz Octa-core 4GB
Αποθηκευτικός χώρος:128GB
Λειτουργικό: Android 11
Wi-Fi: 2.4GHz/5GHz
Κάμερα: μπροστά 8MP/πίσω 13MP
Μπαταρία: 3.8V/9360mAH
Διαστάσεις: 318×40.5×246.5mm

features.text: Whole system detection, supporting detection functions such as code reading, code clearing, data stream reading, and action testing
features.svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' class='icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-code' width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24' stroke-width='1.5' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'><path stroke='none' d='M0 0h24v24H0z' fill='none'/><path d='M7 8l-4 4l4 4' /><path d='M17 8l4 4l-4 4' /><path d='M14 4l-4 16' /></svg>

features.text: Provide the topological graph of the whole vehicle, clearly display the vehicle communication network and quickly locate the fault point
features.svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' class='icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-topology-full' width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24' stroke-width='1.5' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'><path stroke='none' d='M0 0h24v24H0z' fill='none'/><path d='M20 18a2 2 0 1 0 -4 0a2 2 0 0 0 4 0z' /><path d='M8 18a2 2 0 1 0 -4 0a2 2 0 0 0 4 0z' /><path d='M8 6a2 2 0 1 0 -4 0a2 2 0 0 0 4 0z' /><path d='M20 6a2 2 0 1 0 -4 0a2 2 0 0 0 4 0z' /><path d='M6 8v8' /><path d='M18 16v-8' /><path d='M8 6h8' /><path d='M16 18h-8' /><path d='M7.5 7.5l9 9' /><path d='M7.5 16.5l9 -9' /></svg>

features.text: It can be used with SmartSafe's full series of ADAS calibration main racks, covering ADAS calibration of European, American, Asian and domestic passenger and commercial vehicles
features.svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' class='icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-car' width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24' stroke-width='1.5' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'><path stroke='none' d='M0 0h24v24H0z' fill='none'/><path d='M7 17m-2 0a2 2 0 1 0 4 0a2 2 0 1 0 -4 0' /><path d='M17 17m-2 0a2 2 0 1 0 4 0a2 2 0 1 0 -4 0' /><path d='M5 17h-2v-6l2 -5h9l4 5h1a2 2 0 0 1 2 2v4h-2m-4 0h-6m-6 -6h15m-6 0v-5' /></svg>

features.text: Used with G3 module, it supports the anti-theft matching function of many European, American, Asian and domestic models, and more brands are being updated continuously
Support 34 common maintenance functions

functionsText: SmartSafe ST10 is a versatile vehicle diagnostic scanner, what problems can it solve for you? SmartSafe have complete solutions for you!

functionItems.title: ADAS Calibration
functionItems.description: Supports ADAS system calibration of many models in Europe, America, Asia and China, compatible with ADAS PRO+, ADAS MOBILE, ADAS LITE, ADAS RADAR 3IN1 and other equipment

functionItems.title: Car Anti-theft
functionItems.description: Support the anti-theft matching function of many models in Europe, America, Asia, China, and support the anti-theft programmer function (optional IMMO G3)

functionItems.title: Vehicle Detection
functionItems.description: Support for code reading, code clearing, data stream reading, action testing, special functions and other full-system and full-function detections

functionItems.title: Maintenance Function
functionItems.description: Support 30 common maintenance functions, such as maintenance light reset, throttle matching, brake pad replacement, steering angle reset, anti-theft matching, ABS bleeding injector coding, DPF regeneration, sunroof initialization, Gearbox matching, etc

functionItems.title: Test Report
functionItems.description: Support the display of ADAS calibration, fault detection, data flow and other reports

functionItems.title: Software Upgrade
functionItems.description: Support online upgrades, including model software, firmware software, and APP software

functionItems.title: Module expansion
functionItems.description: Support tread detection, oscilloscope, multimeter, current clamp, insulation test, endoscope, and other functional expansions

SmartSafe ST10 Intelligent Automotive Detection Tool User's Manual

name: CNC605A
shortDescription: Συσκευή καθαρισμού και ελέγχου μπεκ GDI Supported, 220V
longDescription:
Εχει δυνατή γεννήτρια υπερηχων
Μικροεπεξεργαστη για την σταθερη και ευέλικτη προσομοίωση του ελεγχου
Μεγαλη οθόνη αφης με την δυνατοτητα επιλογης προγραμματων και παρακολουθηση πληροφοριων για τον χρηστη
Αυτοματο αδειασμα των δοχειων μετα την ληξη

Εκτελουνται με την σειρα τα παρακατω

* Καθαρισμός με υπερηχους
Ελεγχο δέσμης ψεκασμου
Τεστ διαρροης
Ογκομετρηση
Πίεση ελέγχου 0,1-10 bar
RPM 100-9900
Παλμος 0,5-25,0ms
Χωρητικοτητα 3L
Η συσκευή κατασκευάζεται απο την LAUNCH

features.text: Supports cleaning and testing of GDI, EFI, and SFI fuel injectors
features.svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' class='icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-drop-circle' width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24' stroke-width='1.5' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'><path stroke='none' d='M0 0h24v24H0z' fill='none'/><path d='M10.07 15.34c1.115 .88 2.74 .88 3.855 0c1.115 -.88 1.398 -2.388 .671 -3.575l-2.596 -3.765l-2.602 3.765c-.726 1.187 -.443 2.694 .672 3.575z' /><path d='M12 12m-9 0a9 9 0 1 0 18 0a9 9 0 1 0 -18 0' /></svg>

features.text: Utilizes ultrasonic intensive cleaning technology to thoroughly remove carbon deposits and filter screen residues from the fuel injectors
features.svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' class='icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-uv-index' width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24' stroke-width='1.5' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'><path stroke='none' d='M0 0h24v24H0z' fill='none'/><path d='M3 12h1m16 0h1m-15.4 -6.4l.7 .7m12.1 -.7l-.7 .7m-9.7 5.7a4 4 0 1 1 8 0' /><path d='M12 4v-1' /><path d='M13 16l2 5h1l2 -5' /><path d='M6 16v3a2 2 0 1 0 4 0v-3' /></svg>

features.text: Utilizes microcomputer automatic control technology for automatic control of the cleaning and testing process, and real-time monitoring of the key performance of the fuel injectors
features.svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' class='icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-cpu' width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24' stroke-width='1.5' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'><path stroke='none' d='M0 0h24v24H0z' fill='none'/><path d='M5 5m0 1a1 1 0 0 1 1 -1h12a1 1 0 0 1 1 1v12a1 1 0 0 1 -1 1h-12a1 1 0 0 1 -1 -1z' /><path d='M9 9h6v6h-6z' /><path d='M3 10h2' /><path d='M3 14h2' /><path d='M10 3v2' /><path d='M14 3v2' /><path d='M21 10h-2' /><path d='M21 14h-2' /><path d='M14 21v-2' /><path d='M10 21v-2' /></svg>

features.text: Equipped with various non-dismantle cleaning connectors, capable of non-dismantle cleaning and maintenance for multiple vehicle models

features.text: Through simulating engine operating conditions, comprehensively tests various aspects of the fuel injector's performance
features.svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' class='icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-engine' width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24' stroke-width='1.5' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'><path stroke='none' d='M0 0h24v24H0z' fill='none'/><path d='M3 10v6' /><path d='M12 5v3' /><path d='M10 5h4' /><path d='M5 13h-2' /><path d='M6 10h2l2 -2h3.382a1 1 0 0 1 .894 .553l1.448 2.894a1 1 0 0 0 .894 .553h1.382v-2h2a1 1 0 0 1 1 1v6a1 1 0 0 1 -1 1h-2v-2h-3v2a1 1 0 0 1 -1 1h-3.465a1 1 0 0 1 -.832 -.445l-1.703 -2.555h-2v-6z' /></svg>

functionsText: Suitable for different occasions and functions, CNC605 Injector Cleaner and Tester is a classic device for SmartSafe cleaning and maintenance.

functionItems.title: Working Mode Selection
functionItems.description: Can select GDI or EFI working mode based on the injector type

functionItems.title: Ultrasonic Cleaning
functionItems.description: Capable of simultaneously ultrasonic cleaning multiple injectors, effectively removing carbon buildup

functionItems.title: Uniformity/Spray Testing
functionItems.description: Detects the uniformity of fuel injection quantity for each injector and allows comprehensive observation of the injector spray pattern using background lighting

functionItems.title: Sealing Test
functionItems.description: Tests the sealing and leakage of injectors under system pressure

functionItems.title: Fuel Injection Quantity Detection
functionItems.description: Measures the fuel injection quantity of injectors under a constant 15-second injection condition

functionItems.title: Automatic Cleaning and Testing
functionItems.description: Under specific working parameters, realistically simulates injector testing under various conditions

functionItems.title: Reverse Flush
functionItems.description: For the uniformity/spray testing item, performs a reverse flush using a reverse flush adapter to remove internal injector contaminants and residues attached to the filter screen

functionItems.title: Non-Dismantle Cleaning
functionItems.description: Equipped with various non-dismantle cleaning adapters, allowing non-dismantle cleaning and maintenance for multiple vehicle models
